Since last time, Ash and his friends have been on a ferry,
sailing from the resort of Porta Vista to continue their Pokemon journey.
That must be Maiden's Peak, that is where we get off.
Ah, it would not matter to me if I never saw land again.
But we had a whole summer of adventures.
For kids, summer means playing on the beach,
splashing around and having fun, but for me...
summer means bathing suits and girls to wear them.
Now bikini season's over and I will have to wait another year to meet a girl.
-We are really at the end of our rope.
We do not have a cent and at least this beats swimming.
We invite you all to attend our annual summer's end festival,
I will ride the Ferris wheel all alone.
Heh, people spend a lot of money at these festivals,
but they never pay attention, so they drop their change all over the place.
That festival is waiting, and I can smell money.
- Let us go on the Ferris wheel.
- Let us go on the Ferris wheel. -
She was the most beautiful girl I have ever seen.
Ah, you are not that beautiful.
Not of an old beauty like me
but of a beautiful young woman or you will meet a cruel fate.
Ah, I must be the beautiful girl she is talking about
but I would never hurt Brock.
I was talking about an elegant young woman,
not some scrawny little blabbermouth like you.
I do not have to stand around here and be insulted.
The cruelest fate would be never to see her again.
There is no money anywhere at this festival!
Not a quarter, nickel or dime.
What kind of cheap festival is this?
We got to keep looking till we find something.
A penny! - Hold it right there.
You are up to no good.
And there is no good in your future.
I see a young and beautiful woman who will lead you to a cruel fate.
I do not need a fortune teller to know that.
Some woman is always causing me trouble.
I am with the local police department and I know exactly what you are all doing.
I see you found some change that someone dropped.
Whenever money's lost, even a penny, it must be reported to the authorities.
Thanks for being such and observant citizen.
Now, if you will just follow me, we will file a report at the station.
-We do not want to get in your way,
so why do not you go ahead and file it without us and keep the change?
we will now display the shrine of the Maiden's greatest treasure.
For 2,000 years, this painting has hung within the shrine of the Maiden.
Once each year, it is removed from the shrine
and displayed to the public during this festival.
As I unveil the painting, please gaze upon it with reverence.
She is the girl of my dreams.
The woman in this painting perished over 2,000 years ago.
She was in love with a brave and handsome young man
but he left her and sailed away to fight in a war.
I will wait for you forever.
And she did wait for a very long time,
hoping to see his ship on the horizon.
But her true love never returned to that place again.
Still, she waited and waited, never moving from that spot,
until finally her body was turned into stone,
just like the cliff upon which she stood.
To this day, she waits for her love to return.
Maiden's rock is not far from this shrine.
It is the most beautiful rock I have ever seen.
I do not care if she is made of stone.
I am still in love with her.
I would make sure she was never out of my sight.
No one would ever steal her from me, not even Team Rocket.
I will fight them to keep her safe.
Why would we steal a thing like that?
Pokemon are valuable but so are works of art.
If we grab that painting, we could make a bundle.
Before you grab it, grab hold of me.
No matter how long you wait here, a rock is a rock, Brock.
Yeah, let us go back to the festival.
Why do not you two go back.
I want to stay a little bit longer.
You remember where we are staying tonight, right?
The Pokemon Center near the port.
I will make it back by curfew.
Brock still is not back yet.
I will go out and look for him.
-Do not you realize it is your bedtime?
-Yes, but- -Staying up late is bad for your skin
and it makes you irritable and it ruins your appetite.
Now get to bed this instant.
Hmm, beautiful, I must meet you.
-My love, I am waiting for you.
I have been waiting for you for such a long time.
If you are not here, at least come out and tell us.
Oh, wait a minute, you are not the one I was looking for.
Hey, are you looking for somebody, too?
Prepare for trouble and make it double.
Doing this by myself is a real drag.
To protect the world from devastation.
To unite all peoples within our nation.
To denounce the evils of truth and love.
To extend our reach to the stars above.
Ah, Team Rocket, blast off at the speed of light.
-What do you think you are doing?
So everything turned out just as I predicted.
Obviously, these two have both seen the Ghost of the Maiden.
I am James from Team Rocket.
All men who pass this way fall under her spell.
It is always the same story, over and over.
We find them here acting like zombies with the life sucked out of them,
It is the work of that Maiden's ghost,
still waiting for her young soldier to return.
It is just as I warned you.
who cares as long as I can be with her?
You have got to do something!
-There is only one thing we can do.
I cannot just give these stickers away for free.
If it is the only thing that will help.
We will stick stickers all over the place.
-Yes, and I have been waiting too.
We got one set free for every set they bought.
I cannot believe you are letting that ghost get me,
just because you are both so cheap.
-Of course I do not want to go.
I do not want to go.
I do not want to go.
I do not want to go.
I do not want to go!
-You have not got a ghost of a chance. -
It is not because of you.
Always waiting around for her man, as if she were his faithful pet.
She cannot stand the thought of losing him.
But I would say, see you later.
-There are plenty more fish in the sea.
-I could sure go for some fish.
So you finally figured it out.
Sometimes I am the ghost of the 2,000-year-old maiden...
And sometimes, I am the mysterious old woman.
But no matter what the disguise, I will always be...
Well, Gastly, time for a battle.
My hypnotic powers can work on other Pokemon too
So, Meowth, you want to play games with me?
Here is a cat toy I think you will enjoy.
A snake's natural enemy is a mongoose.
Here is something for you, squirt.
Here are Bulbasaur's and Squirtle's evolved forms,
And just for fun, I will combine them into one super-Pokemon
I have also got garlic, a stake and a hammer.
Uh, what do I look like, a vampire or something?
I may not be a vampire but I hate sunlight.
It is time for me to go until the next festival.
Do not forget the Ghost of the Maiden.
She and the old lady will return next year too.
At the end of every summer, the visitors send out these tiny boats,
each one with a candle to help light the way
for any wandering spirits who cannot find their way back home.
This summer is over but your legend will continue to live on.
I enjoy keeping alive all the old legends that people have forgotten over the years,
I will see you again next festival.
I will be waiting until that day when my true love returns to me at last.
Well, I am a ghost Pokemon.
Perhaps one day I will meet the young man you love,
and if I do, I will remind him
that his maiden still longs for him to return.
If only you were 2,000 years younger.
I think I am doing a bang-up job.
Let us drum up some fun.
And so the summer festival draws to a close.
There is autumn in the air,
which means that poor Brock will not get back to the beach until next year.
A lot can happen in a year's time.
and romances are waiting just over the horizon.
